content:
In the south, the fight of the Marine Corps named after counter -admiral Mikhail Bilynsky destroyed Russian armored vehicles.

Appropriate videoPosted on March 24The Navy of the Armed Forces.

According to the Navy, the invaders' tank was destroyed by the fighters of the Bear Unit of the Nikolaev Marines.

As reported earlierArmyinform,In the south, 3 enemy SPRs and "hail" were amazed.
title: Marines showed the destruction of a hostile tank
description: The corresponding video was posted on March 24 by the Navy of the Armed Forces. According to the Navy, the tank ...
author: Army Inform
